title: CLG PREFERENCE
content:
OPTION ENTRY FOR KCET COUNSELLING IS ABOUT TO START. MY KCET RANK IS 2029. WHICH OPTION WOOULD BE THE BEST TO CONSIDER ?

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/15atqwl)

comments.body:
I don't think you'll get ece in rvce
last year cutoff was 1.7k

brother why are you talking in all caps.  
are you interested in cs or ece?
I am interested in CS but I don't mind taking ece if it is RVCE. Sorry for the caps, I forgot to switch off the caps lock.
hm why dont you mind ece at rv? (just curious, cuz if you want cs placement, take cs)
I like that clg. I wouldn't mind taking ece if I can get into rv
But people have told me colleges should be given preference over branch. Cuz opportunities depend on the clg we choose.
lmao. cs companies will always prefer cs students over ece studentd. there is some truth that statement tho

I'm thinking of majoring in cse or cs(aiml) at PESU rr campus but the intake of students is scaring me(I want a good package while getting placed but I feel   like it's going to be difficult with a lot of students) 
Should I consider CSE or aiml at msrit or bmsce????
